snippet.title: Stocks to watch on Wednesday
snippet.content: Stocks to watch on the Australian stock exchange: APO - APN OUTDOOR - up 1 cent, or 0.2 per cent, at $4.63 The billboard advertising giant's chief executive Richard Herring will step down at the end of September. GMA - GENWORTH MORTGAGE INSURANCE - up 12 cents, or 4 per cent, at $3.14 The company's half year profit dropped 35 per cent due to adverse portfolio revaluations, higher delinquencies and a slip in premiums. RMD - RESMED - down 53 cents, or 5.5 per cent, at $9.13 The respiratory face mask and machine maker's annual profit fell slightly despite higher revenue. RIO - RIO TINTO - down 12 cents, or 0.2 per cent, at $65.83 The mining giant is expected to report a big jump in half year underlying profit to around $US4 billion when it releases its financial results after the market closes for trade on Wednesday. Originally published as
